ARABIC: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّى يَقْذِفُ بِٱلْحَقِّ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلْغُيُوبِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'My Lord hurls forth the Truth - the Knower of all unseen things.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "My Lord casts the truth: He is the knower of things unknown."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say to them: “My Lord hurls down the Truth (upon me). He knows fully all that lies beyond the range of perception.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "My Lord speaks the Truth. He has the knowledge of the unseen".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim, “Indeed my Lord sends down the truth; the All Knowing of all the hidden.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Verily, my Lord sends down the truth, the All-Knower of the Unseen."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Surely my Lord utters the truth, the great Knower of the unseen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'My Lord hurls the truth -- the Knower of the Unseen.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Lo! my Lord hurleth the truth. (He is) the Knower of Things Hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say to them, "My Lord hurls forth the Truth [at falsehood] and He is the knower of hidden things."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: verily my Lord hurleth the truth: the Knower of things hidden.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Indeed my Lord hurls the truth. [He is] the knower of all that is Unseen.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "Verily my Lord doth cast the (mantle of) Truth (over His servants),- He that has full knowledge of (all) that is hidden."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "Verily! My Lord sends down Inspiration and makes apparent the truth (i.e. this Revelation that had come to me), the AllKnower of the Ghaib (unseen).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'My Lord hurls the truth the Knower of the Unseen'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “My Lord projects the truth. He is the Knower of the Unseen.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Indeed, my Lord projects the truth. Knower of the unseen."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [34:48] Say: ‘Indeed my Lord hurls the truth, He casts it onto His prophets — [He is] the Knower of the Unseen’, [of] all that is hidden from His creatures throughout the heavens and the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) to them, Muhammad: (Lo! my Lord hurleth the Truth) He explains the Truth and commands the Truth. ((He is) the Knower of Things Hidden) He knows whatever is hidden from the servants.
